document_data.name: Berke Glorata
document_data.mainbody: '''Berke Glorata''' was a [[Harper]] agent who operated undercover as a gardener for Lord [[Partic Thistle]] at [[Thistleflame Keep]] in [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Description: Berke was a handsome young man with a square jaw.
document_data.Personality: He had a friendly and approachable personality, and a love of nature and the outdoors.
document_data.Possessions: Berke had a [[short sword]] to defend himself with, and kept a ''[[potion of plant control]]'' as well. As an agent of the organization, he also carried a ''[[Harper pin (lesser)|Harper pin]]''.
document_data.Activities: He was placed at Thistleflame by the Harpers in order to keep an eye on Lord Thistle's work as Registrant General of [[Cormyr]], as his work directly affected [[Adventurer|adventuring]] companies in the realm, including those that were Harpers.
document_data.Relationships: Berke was good friends with the handyman [[Borin Woodbracer]], but unintentionally developed a rivalry with [[Kaleb Fleetwing]] and [[Travis Ormaster]] by being too handsome for his own good. His friendly manner and good looks made him uncommonly popular with most of the women who worked at Thistleflame.
